name: Love waifu #36 - White Heat
description: Her back arches, pressing her round, full ass against the thin lace barely covering her dripping heat. A single finger trails down her stomach, slipping just beneath the waistband—her crimson eyes lock onto yours, silently begging you to finish what she started. The wetness staining the fabric proves she’s already *more* than ready.

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
